T02D2674:116b-1: siddhee ka b'i ra tantra t'i k'a /
T02D2674:116b-3: dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa /
T02D2674:116b-4: dpal rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2674:116b-5: gang zhig sgrol ma'i zhabs pad spyi bos len mdzad cing //
T02D2674:116b-6: bde gshegs tshul khrims gsum ldan dri med dge 'byung gnas //
T02D2674:116b-7: bstan pa'i khur 'dzin bzod pa gsum gyis brgyan pa po //
T02D2674:116b-8: srid gsum mchod 'os byams pa'i rtsa lag la btud de //
T02D2674:116b-9: bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin rgyud gzhung 'di dag gi //
T02D2674:116b-10: snying rje'i ga bur yal ga rgyas pa rgya che ba //
T02D2674:116b-11: gsal zhing gzhal med dga' ba'i rol pa padma'i rtse //
T02D2674:116b-12: dpa' bo gcig sgrub rgyud tshig gsal bar dbye bar bya //
T02D2674:116b-13: rgyud 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni ci zhig / de bzhin du dgos pa dang /
T02D2674:116b-15: 'brel pa ni gang zhig snyam na /
T02D2674:116b-16: zhi ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi las
T02D2674:116b-17: kyi tshogs rnams ni rgyud 'di'i brjod par bya ba
T02D2674:116b-18: yin la / de'i don rgyud kyi gzhung gi tshogs
T02D2674:116b-19: le'u bzhi pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la brten nas
T02D2674:116b-20: rtogs par gyur pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D2674:116b-21: sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don rang dang
T02D2674:116b-22: gzhan gyi bde legs phun sum tshogs pa la dbang
T02D2674:116b-23: 'byor pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
T02D2674:116b-24: 'brel pa ni shugs las shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:116b-25: kha cig 'di snyam du 'di skad bdag gis zhes
T02D2674:116b-26: pa la sogs pa gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2674:116b-27: ston pa'i tshig med pas ston pa'i gsung rab nyid
T02D2674:116b-28: du ma grub po snyam du rtog na ma yin
T02D2674:116b-29: te / 'di skad thes pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2674:116b-30: sogs pa ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs
T02D2674:116b-31: pa sdud pa po'i tshig yin la /
T02D2674:116b-32: 'dir ni ston pa dang sdud pa po tha dad
T02D2674:116b-33: med par dgongs nas sdud pa po'i tshig ma gsungs
T02D2674:117a-0: pa yin no // yang na ae wam ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med @117a * //
T02D2674:117a-2: rgyud kyi brjod par bya ba thams cad kyang ye
T02D2674:117a-3: nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bdag
T02D2674:117a-4: nyid du gnas pas ae wam gyi sgra ma gsungs
T02D2674:117a-5: par zad do // yang na rgyud 'dir ni yongs
T02D2674:117a-6: su rdzogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir gleng gzhi ma
T02D2674:117a-7: par zad do // gsungs te / sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D2674:117a-8: de ltar gdul bya rnams kyi the tshom gyi rnam
T02D2674:117a-9: par rtog pa bsal nas rgyud kyi gzhung la 'jug
T02D2674:117a-10: par byed do // gang zag mos pa dang skal
T02D2674:117a-11: ba tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa'i 'bras
T02D2674:117a-12: par byed do // bu dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu la mos pa gnyis las /
T02D2674:117a-13: dang po'i dbang du byas te /
T02D2674:117a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
T02D2674:117a-15: pa zag pa dang rgya che ba'i bstan bcos la
T02D2674:117a-16: 'jug mi nus pa'i sems can la /
T02D2674:117a-17: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i phrin las la nges pa dang bcas pa de dag la /
T02D2674:117a-18: snying rje chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur pa nyid
T02D2674:117a-19: kyis rang rang gi rgyud du rtog pa la gnas
T02D2674:117a-20: pa'i dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa rnams gcig tu
T02D2674:117a-21: yang dag par bsdus te bstan to //
T02D2674:117a-22: gang zhig don 'di la nges par phyogs pa de
T02D2674:117a-23: dag 'di rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas
T02D2674:117a-24: sa bcu dang pha rol phyin pa la sogs pas
T02D2674:117a-25: rgyud sde yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur
T02D2674:117a-26: ro // 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:117a-27: dpa' bo gcig pa'i rgyud chen po 'dzin par nus pa'i gdul bya yang mi snang yang /
T02D2674:117a-28: cung zad tsam 'dod pa'i gdul bya la thugs rjes
T02D2674:117a-29: rjes su chags pa ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste
T02D2674:117a-31: 'jam dpal ni sku gsung thugs mdzes pa'o //
T02D2674:117a-32: rdo rje ni mi shigs pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2674:117a-33: des rgyud rab tu gsungs zhes 'brel to //
T02D2674:117a-34: gang gi don du zhe na /
T02D2674:117a-35: sems can thams cad kyi don du ste /
T02D2674:117a-36: sems kyi zhen pa ni bdag gi'o //
T02D2674:117a-37: don gyis zhes pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D2674:117a-38: sbyin pa la sogs pas rang gi rgyud la bsod
T02D2674:117a-39: nams kyi tshogs sogs pas sems can gyi don to
T02D2674:117a-40: // yang na sems ni gdul bya la //
T02D2674:117a-41: don ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2674:117a-42: de'i don du rgyud dang sngags dang rdzas dang ting
T02D2674:117b-0: @117b nge 'dzin la sogs pas yang dag par bsdus
T02D2674:117b-1: pa'o // rgyun mi 'chad pas na rgyud de bshad
T02D2674:117b-2: par bya ba zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2674:117b-3: gdul bya'i rgyud la rjes su 'brel pa'o //
T02D2674:117b-4: de gang yin na dpa' bo'i gtso zhes pa ste /
T02D2674:117b-5: dpa' bo ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye
T02D2674:117b-6: ba g-yul du rnam par 'joms pa la brtson 'grus
T02D2674:117b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2674:117b-9: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni mnga' bdag ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2674:117b-10: chos ston pa la don dang tshig la mi 'jigs
T02D2674:117b-11: pas gdul bya'i rgyud bla na med pa'i yon tan
T02D2674:117b-12: phyir smra ba rnams kyi mchog go ;
T02D2674:117b-13: / yang na smra ba rnams ni ston pa ste /
T02D2674:117b-14: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2674:117b-16: rtogs pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rdo rje
T02D2674:117b-17: 'jigs byed la sogs par sprul pa'i dus su lha
T02D2674:117b-18: chen po rnams spobs pa med par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2674:117b-19: ro // de bas na de dag ni skyes bu
T02D2674:117b-20: chen po'i ming gi yon tan dag gis khyad par
T02D2674:117b-21: ro // du 'phags pa'o // 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes pa la /
T02D2674:117b-22: 'gro ba ni shin tu 'od gsal bar 'gro ba dang /
T02D2674:117b-25: de dag gi bla ma ni mnga' bdag go //
T02D2674:117b-26: yang na 'gro ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi don
T02D2674:117b-27: ma rtogs pa rnams yin la de dul bas na
T02D2674:117b-28: bla ma'o // yang na 'gro ba drug gi gzugs su gyur pas 'gro ba ste /
T02D2674:117b-30: de dag la dbang mdzad pas bla ma'o //
T02D2674:117b-31: ji ltar na rgyud yin zhe na /
T02D2674:117b-32: dpa' bo gcig grub pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2674:117b-33: grub pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa la rab tu grags pa ste /
T02D2674:117b-34: las gang dang gang gi dbang du byas pa'i rdzas dang sngags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2674:117b-35: zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyis bdud 'joms dpa' bo rnams so //
T02D2674:117b-36: rab mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D2674:117b-37: gzugs can gyi lha bsgom par sngags pas sngags de dag ci'i phyir sgrub ce na /
T02D2674:117b-39: lha nyid cas pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2674:117b-40: sngags gang grub pa'i yongs su gsal bar gyur na de'i lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2674:117b-41: 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs pa'i don to //
T02D2674:118a-2: rdzogs pa'i ram pa la lha dang sngags tha dad med pa dang /
T02D2674:118a-3: bskyed rim la rgyu lha la 'bras bu sngags su bstan pas so //
T02D2674:118a-5: lha nyid gsang sngags tshul gyis ni //
T02D2674:118a-6: zhes pa nyid ni ma nor ba'i don to //
T02D2674:118a-7: sngags pa ni sgrub pa po'o //
T02D2674:118a-9: bsgoms na ni zhes pa ni rnam pa de la
T02D2674:118a-10: yang dang yang du rtse gcig tu bya ba'i dang
T02D2674:118a-11: po yid ches pa'i don du 'dod pa'i don la
T02D2674:118a-12: yang dag par bzlas pa'i sngags kyis dngos grub chen
T02D2674:118a-13: po la mi sbyor ro zhes gsungs pa ni phra
T02D2674:118a-14: mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D2674:118a-15: legs par bzlas pa'i sngags ni don de bsgoms pas
T02D2674:118a-16: 'di dang phyi mar lhag par rtogs pa'i bsgom pa
T02D2674:118a-17: 'od gsal pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i rjes su
T02D2674:118a-18: rim pas chos thams cad rnyed pas zhes gsungs pas
T02D2674:118a-19: so // sa la sogs ba go sla'o //
T02D2674:118a-20: dang po rab tu 'jug pa'i sgo nas 'di bshad pa'o //
T02D2674:118a-21: de ltar mkhyen nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2674:118a-22: aom k'a lu zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'chad
T02D2674:118a-23: par 'gyur pa'i rengs par byed pa'i sngags bzhi ste
T02D2674:118a-24: / 'di la yang bsnyen pa dang las la sbyar
T02D2674:118a-25: ba'i dus thams cad du skad cig gis rdo rje
T02D2674:118a-27: dang po dang gnyis pa'i sngags kyi mngon spyod la
T02D2674:118a-28: sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid
T02D2674:118a-29: kyis bya'o // legs par bzlas na zhes pa ni 'bum bzlas pa'o //
T02D2674:118a-30: dran pa nyid ces pa thams cad du brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so //
T02D2674:118a-31: thal ba la zhes pa ni rdza mkhan gyi thal bas so //
T02D2674:118a-32: mngon par bzlas na zhes pa ni lag pa g-yas
T02D2674:118a-33: pa'i mthil du thal ba bzhag nas lag pa g-yon
T02D2674:118a-34: pa'i srin lag gis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so
T02D2674:118a-37: aom ga ru zhes pa la sogs pa ni thod
T02D2674:118a-38: lo kor dang rda lcag la lan nyi shu rtsa
T02D2674:118a-39: gcig mngon par bzlas nas rda brdung bar bya'o /
T02D2674:118a-40: aom he he zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:118a-41: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2674:118a-42: bla ma la gsol ba btab nas nyi ma re
T02D2674:118a-43: re bzhin lus thams cad bkru ba dang zas dkar
T02D2674:118b-0: @118b gsum za ba rgyun ma chad pas 'bum phrag
T02D2674:118b-2: thal ba dang zhes pa ni gza' nyi ma'i tshes
T02D2674:118b-3: grangs la bram ze shi ba'i thab kyi thal ba'am
T02D2674:118b-4: yang na dge slong gi thab kyi thal ba dang
T02D2674:118b-5: / ba dmar skya'i lci ba thang lam lhung ba'i thal ba'o //
T02D2674:118b-6: yungs kar la zhes pa ni bram ze'i thod phor du kun rdzob kyi bdud rtsi byugs te /
T02D2674:118b-7: skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par yungs kar bskrun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D2674:118b-8: yang na yungs kar nyid la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so //
T02D2674:118b-9: zhing las zhes pa ni zhing gi phyogs gcig tu sgo gcig gzhag ste /
T02D2674:118b-10: gzhan du na byi ba la sogs pa 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:118b-11: dur khrod kyi ras ni ro ras so //
T02D2674:118b-12: dur khrod kyi bum pa ni 'o mas rab tu bkang ba'i bum pa dur khrod du bskyal ba'o //
T02D2674:118b-13: sbas pa ni rlung bzung nas zhes bya bas te man ngag go //
T02D2674:118b-14: yung ba zhes pa ni 'dir rengs pa'i ras la bri ba ste /
T02D2674:118b-15: yung ba dang ba bla dang aa ru ra'i chu bsres pas so //
T02D2674:118b-16: rgol ba ni bkur sti la sogs pa la phrag dog pa'o //
T02D2674:118b-17: rtsod sbyong ba ni nor gyi don du phan tshun rtsod pa'o //
T02D2674:118b-18: kham phor ni zhabs nag po ra ri med pa
T02D2674:118b-19: la sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i thod lo kor gyis
T02D2674:118b-20: sngags g-yas skor du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2674:118b-21: kha sbyor du byas te zhes pa ni steng du
T02D2674:118b-22: gnas pa'i kham phor la sna tshogs rdo rje ser
T02D2674:118b-23: po bri'o // de'i phyir rol du skud pa ser
T02D2674:118b-24: pos dkri bar bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go
T02D2674:118b-25: po bri'o // // rkang pa'i mthil du sngags kyi
T02D2674:118b-26: rgyal po 'di bcug ste zhes pa ni rkang pa
T02D2674:118b-28: bla gos ni gos kyi phyogs gcig la mi mthun
T02D2674:118b-29: pa thams cad rab tu zhugs par bsgoms te rang
T02D2674:118b-30: gi gnas kyi mtshams 'dab rlung bzung ste nus tshad
T02D2674:118b-31: kyi sngags bzlas nas mdud pa bya ste /
T02D2674:118b-32: 'drul gyi rgyab na gnas pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs phyi
T02D2674:118b-33: mas kyang sngags dang 'dun pa'i grogs byas nas cho
T02D2674:118b-35: 'jigs pa las thar nas mdud pa dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2674:118b-36: chu'i pha rol du phyin nas bong ba bcug pa de gdon par bya'o //
T02D2674:118b-37: gnyis dang ldan par bri ste zhes pa ni sna
T02D2674:118b-38: tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du sa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D2674:119a-0: phyogs dang mtshams su rdo rje rgya @119a * //
T02D2674:119a-1: gram gyi rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2674:119a-2: pha rol gyi mtshams sam ri khrod la sba bar bya'o //
T02D2674:119a-3: sngags aom gnyis kyi kha sbyor zhes pa ni lhor
T02D2674:119a-4: sngags mgo gnyis phan tshun phrad par byas pa aom
T02D2674:119a-5: gnyis kyi dbus su bri bar bya'o //
T02D2674:119a-6: tha gnyis kyis yongs su bskor zhes pa la tha
T02D2674:119a-7: gnyis ni tsheg drag ste de dag gi phyi rol
T02D2674:119a-8: du bri'o // sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes
T02D2674:119a-9: pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par
T02D2674:119a-10: du bri'o // ro // chu gnyis pa bdun zhes pa ni bum pa sar pa'i chus so //
T02D2674:119a-11: thal bas zhes pa ni rma bya chen mo'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D2674:119a-12: nas chan ni bal sran dang 'bras 'dres pa btsos pa'i zan no //
T02D2674:119a-13: gtor ma chen po gtang bar bya //
T02D2674:119a-14: zhes pa ni gtor ma gtong ba'i dus su khyung gi dang /
T02D2674:119a-16: dpal be'u'i phyag rgya gsum bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2674:119a-17: de la khyung gi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis
T02D2674:119a-18: thal mo brkyang ba rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis
T02D2674:119a-19: lu gu rgyud du mdud nas ming med kyi sen
T02D2674:119a-20: mo gnyis mthe bong gis mnan pa'o //
T02D2674:119a-21: de gnyis la sdigs mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa dang /
T02D2674:119a-22: gung mo dang ming med kyi sen mo'i steng du mthe bong gzhag pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2674:119a-23: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ming med nang
T02D2674:119a-24: du bskums pa'i sen mo la nye ba'i tshigs kyi
T02D2674:119a-25: rgyab mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan te /
T02D2674:119a-26: mthe'u gnyis rtse sprad cing gung mo gnyis kyang brkyang
T02D2674:119a-27: rtse sprad de mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi
T02D2674:119a-28: rgyab tu lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni dpal
T02D2674:119a-30: yang lag pa gnyis gan rkyal du byas nas g-yon dang g-yas pa nyi ma dang /
T02D2674:119a-31: zla ba dang nyi ma la a'a li dang k'a lis mtshan pa bsgoms la //
T02D2674:119a-32: yang lag pa gnyis kha spub par bya ste /
T02D2674:119a-33: aom brjod pas g-yon pa bstan /
T02D2674:119a-34: a'a: brjod pas g-yas pa bstan /
T02D2674:119a-35: h'um brjod pas gnyis ka mnyam par sbub la gtor ma la bstan ;
T02D2674:119a-36: de'i rjes su lag pa gnyis mnyam por kha sbyar
T02D2674:119a-37: nas rdo rje rtse gcig gi phyag rgya gtor snod
T02D2674:119a-38: la reg pa'o // yam shing lnga zhes pa ni /
T02D2674:119b-4: gseg ma zhes pa ni rdo dang dngul la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2674:119b-5: rdo leb la zhes pa ni rdo leb bzhi la
T02D2674:119b-6: sngags bris nas khang pa'i zur bzhi la gzhag par
T02D2674:119b-7: bya'o // dur khrod kyi ro bsregs ba'i shing gi
T02D2674:119b-8: byur bu zhes pa ni gza' nyi ma'i tshes grangs
T02D2674:119b-9: la bram ze'i dge slong gi ro bsregs pa'i shing
T02D2674:119b-10: bya'o // ngo // de sgo'i steng kho na la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2674:119b-11: skyed kyis 'tsho ba zhes pa ni ri dags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2674:119b-12: aom hi ni zhes pa ni bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas pa'i rjes la /
T02D2674:119b-13: ma bsgrubs su zin kyang zhes pa ni las sbyor
T02D2674:119b-14: gyi dus su khyad par gyi cho ga ma byas
T02D2674:119b-16: lan tshva zhes pa ni lan tshva dang ske tshe rin la mi rtseg par nyo ba'o //
T02D2674:119b-17: dpung gi tshogs rnams kyang byer bar ni bskrad pa'o //
T02D2674:119b-18: sbun pa'i sbyin sreg ces pa ni sha mi dang
T02D2674:119b-19: seng ldeng gi yam shing dkyus sor bcu gnyis la
T02D2674:119b-20: sogs sboms su mdzub mo dang mnyam pa'i shing bu
T02D2674:119b-21: shun pa dang bcas spar ba gang sbyin sreg bya'o
T02D2674:119b-22: // rengs pa'i sngags bzhi po 'di dag la sngags
T02D2674:119b-23: gcig gis kyang sngags gzhan gsum gyi rab sbyor byed
T02D2674:119b-24: // par nges so // zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D2674:119b-25: dang dbang du bya ba dang drag po'i las rnams
T02D2674:119b-26: la rim pa bzhin du 'jag ma shar dang /
T02D2674:119b-27: me tog aa mra na dang /
T02D2674:119b-28: mya ngan med pa'i shing dang bya rog gi sgro rnams kyi smyu gus bya'o //
T02D2674:119b-29: aampa simpa zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:119b-30: du pa pu zhes pa'i gong du bdag gi don grub par gyis shig ces gdags par bya'o //
T02D2674:119b-31: rtag tu bzlas pa zhes pa ni nyi ma re re zhing rgyun ma chad par bzlas pa'o //
T02D2674:119b-32: rdo rje'i chu zhes pa ni rdo rje'i lag pa
T02D2674:119b-33: g-yas par blugs nas g-yon pa'i srin lag gis reg
T02D2674:119b-34: ste / lan bdun bzlas nas rlung bzung ste //
T02D2674:119b-36: simpa zhes pa ni simpa'i chung shos sor gsum gyi tshad kyog po ma yin pa'o ;
T02D2674:119b-37: / mngon spyod la sogs pa thams cad la thun gsum ste /
T02D2674:119b-39: g-yon ngos su rdza so btang ba'i thal ba dang /
T02D2674:119b-40: g-yas ngos su shing aa 'bras dang /
T02D2674:119b-42: ras bal gyi lo ma dang /
T02D2674:120a-0: de dag gi lo ma tha dad du bzhag nas mdun du smyug @120a * //
T02D2674:120a-1: ma la byas pa'i snod du lag pa g-yon pas
T02D2674:120a-2: bor nas rkang pa g-yon pas bsgrub bya de'i ling+ga
T02D2674:120a-3: bris nas rkang pa g-yon pas mnye zhing sngags bzlas
T02D2674:120a-4: par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas ling+ga'i snying gar rkang
T02D2674:120a-5: pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong gis mnan cing /
T02D2674:120a-6: ling+ga'i mgo la aa 'bras kyi lo ma dang /
T02D2674:120a-7: snying gar simpa'i lo ma rkang pa la ras bal
T02D2674:120a-8: gyi lo ma bzhag nas sngags bzlas pa'i rjes la
T02D2674:120a-9: rkang pas shin tu mnye bar bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-10: de bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
T02D2674:120a-11: du bri ba dang phyi bar bya ba'i rjes la
T02D2674:120a-12: yi ge la sogs pa ngal so nas thal ba
T02D2674:120a-13: de dag thams cad ngos nas rkang pas shin tu
T02D2674:120a-15: nam phyed kyi thun la yang lan nyi shu rtsa
T02D2674:120a-16: gcig bzlas pa byas pa'i thal ba dang thun mong
T02D2674:120a-17: po la bsres nas mnye bar bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-18: de bzhin du tho rangs kyi thun la'ang de ltar bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-19: gzhan yang thun gnyis kyis zhib ma'i phyogs gcig la
T02D2674:120a-20: bzhag ste langs te mi gtsang ba'i gnas su dor
T02D2674:120a-21: bar bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
T02D2674:120a-22: yang de kho na'i las sbyor gzhan ni skad cig
T02D2674:120a-23: mas rma bya chen mo'i las sbyor gyis zhib ma
T02D2674:120a-24: la sogs pa la don dang sbyar ba sngags bzlas
T02D2674:120a-25: shing lag pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du byas nas
T02D2674:120a-28: ras bal gyi lo ma gsum gcig tu dril nas
T02D2674:120a-29: skud pa ser pos dkris te gong bur bzhag ste
T02D2674:120a-30: / de lta bu lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-31: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa la skud pa dmar po la sogs pas bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-32: 'di ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin mo thun gsum dang mtshan mo thun gsum bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-33: de nas sngar gyi dril ba de skye bos dben
T02D2674:120a-34: pa'i gnas su shing la sogs pa'i 'og tu nyi
T02D2674:120a-35: ma re re gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2674:120a-36: de nas gzhan rdzas 'bags pa can gyi nang du chu dang bcas pa'i skyur po blugs nas ;
T02D2674:120a-37: rim pa ji ltar bar bshad pa'o lo ma rnams
T02D2674:120a-38: snod de gang bar ma gyur gyi bar du sbyin
T02D2674:120a-39: sreg byas nas snod de nyi ma re re zhing
T02D2674:120a-40: mis dben pa'i sar gzhag ste /
T02D2674:120a-41: phyag gi shing bu don ma grub kyi bar du thun gsum gsum du bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2674:120b-0: de nas gzhan yang rdzas 'bags pa @120b la ji
T02D2674:120b-1: ltar bshad pa'i rim pas sngar bshad pa'i lo ma
T02D2674:120b-2: rnams / tshva dang bsres pa'i sngags bskul tshig dang
T02D2674:120b-3: bcas pa bzlas shing don ma grub kyi bar du
T02D2674:120b-4: rnams / sbyin sreg bya'o // snod de nyi ma
T02D2674:120b-5: re re zhing cung zad cung zad yon so sor
T02D2674:120b-7: des ni bsgrub bya nad kyis zin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:120b-8: snod de kha spub par gyur na bsgrub bya de nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:120b-9: snod de bskrus na ni bsgrub bya de nges par sos par 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:120b-10: sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin
T02D2674:120b-11: pas sangs rgyas gsad par 'gyur ba'i nyes pas las
T02D2674:120b-12: sbyor de gnyis kyis gnod pa tsam bya'i gsad pa
T02D2674:120b-13: ni mi bya'o // de nas gzhan yang chu shing
T02D2674:120b-14: gi 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lo ma tsher mas
T02D2674:120b-15: ni mi bya'o // bsgrub bya bris / de'i snying
T02D2674:120b-16: gar don dang bcas pa'i sngags bris nas bzlas shing
T02D2674:120b-17: lo ma dril te bcings nas sbrum ma yin pa
T02D2674:120b-18: la zhag bdun gyi bar du zar gzhug go //
T02D2674:120b-19: gal te mi za na de'i tshe tshva dang bcas pa zar gzhug go //
T02D2674:120b-20: des kyang za bar ma gyur na de'i tshe dngos grub mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
T02D2674:120b-21: de nas gzhan yang dbye bar 'dod na /
T02D2674:120b-22: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sngar bshad pa'i lo
T02D2674:120b-23: ma gsum po gzhag nas dpung pa g-yon pa'i 'og
T02D2674:120b-24: tu nye ba'i lag pa g-yas pas lan brgya rtsa
T02D2674:120b-25: brgyad dril te sa la bskyur te sgrub pa po
T02D2674:120b-26: ma mthong bar langs te 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2674:120b-27: de bzhin du nyin zhag ga sum gsum gyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2674:120b-28: de nas gzhan yang zhib ma'i snod sar pa'i nang
T02D2674:120b-29: du rdza bsregs pa'i thal bas mandala byas nas lag
T02D2674:120b-30: pa g-yas pa'i lo ma gsum po ri mo ji
T02D2674:120b-31: lta bar g-yon pa'i sen mos bcang nas byab pa'i
T02D2674:120b-32: sngags brjod cing thal ba'i mandala gyi steng du dor
T02D2674:120b-33: bar bya'o // de nas mandala de bshig nas dri zhim po la ral gcig ma dang /
T02D2674:120b-34: mya ngan med pa'i lha mo dang /
T02D2674:120b-36: rma bya chen mos yongs su bskor ba'i 'jigs pa
T02D2674:120b-37: med pa'i sgrol ma'i mandala byas nas sngags ji tsam
T02D2674:120b-38: du nus par bzlas pa byas nas zhag bdun du
T02D2674:120b-39: nyin re zhing thun gsum gsum du bya ste /
T02D2674:121a-0: thun re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas thal ba des rtsod sbyong la sogs pa thams @121a * //
T02D2674:121a-2: aa 'bras kyi lo ma srang gcig / shing simpa'i
T02D2674:121a-3: lo ma srang gcig / ras bal gyi lo ma
T02D2674:121a-6: dud pa zho gnyis de dag zhib mar blugs te /
T02D2674:121a-7: mtshan phyed na sgrub pa po gcer bur byas te /
T02D2674:121a-8: skra grol bar byas nas byang du mngon par phyogs te /
T02D2674:121a-9: zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing mnye bar bya'o //
T02D2674:121a-10: yang lo ma de dag srang la bcal te cha bsnyams te /
T02D2674:121a-11: 'dag pa byas nas khang dri'i rus pa'i tshad tsam gyi ri lu bya ste /
T02D2674:121a-12: ku sha'i skud pa la rgyus nas thogs te /
T02D2674:121a-14: kha nub tu bltas nas btson dgrol ba la sogs pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2674:121a-15: phrin las thams cad la phreng ba 'di dang ldan pas phrin las bya'o //
T02D2674:121a-16: de nas yang shing simpa'i lo ma dang dbang du
T02D2674:121a-17: bya ba'i rdzas la sngags bzlas shing sbyin sreg bya'o
T02D2674:121a-18: // de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor la thab khung bya
T02D2674:121a-19: ste mtshan mo'i dus su seng ldeng ngam khang dri'i
T02D2674:121a-20: me la mdog gcig pa'i ka ra bdun gyis thun
T02D2674:121a-22: gzhan yang zhib ma mkhregs po mdun du bzhag nas
T02D2674:121a-23: skrod pa'i las bya ba 'dod pa'i bsam pas sngags
T02D2674:121a-24: spel tshig dang bcas par bzlas shing ;
T02D2674:121a-25: zhib ma la rim pa ji lta bar lo ma
T02D2674:121a-26: gsum gzhag ste bskams pa la lag pa gnyis kyis
T02D2674:121a-27: mnyes te / rang gi g-yon ngos su lo ma'i phye ma de dag la bkab ste /
T02D2674:121a-28: zad pa dang ma mthong bar spangs te 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2674:121a-29: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i lo ma rnams la re
T02D2674:121a-30: re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas tsher mas
T02D2674:121a-31: rengs par byed pa'i sngags spel tshig dang bcas pa
T02D2674:121a-32: bris te / kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du gzhug
T02D2674:121a-33: la kha sbyar ba la rdo rje rgya gram bris
T02D2674:121a-34: la skud pa ser pos dkris nas skud pa sar
T02D2674:121a-35: pa btags te khron par dbyangs pa dang /
T02D2674:121a-36: ji ltar chur nub pa de ltar skud pa gtang bar bya'o /
T02D2674:121a-37: de nas gzhan yang gnas par 'dod pas sngar bshad
T02D2674:121a-38: pa'i lo ma gsum po la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2674:121a-39: shing / lo ma re re la yang kha la
T02D2674:121a-40: phur bu'i 'debs pa'i sngags spel tshig dang bcas pa
T02D2674:121a-41: lan bdun bzlas pa'i tsher mas phug ste dben pa'i
T02D2674:121b-1: / de nas gzhan yang rang nyid mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chur zhugs te /
T02D2674:121b-2: rkang pa g-yas pa aa 'bras kyi yal ga dang /
T02D2674:121b-3: g-yas pas simpa'i yal ga mnan te /
T02D2674:121b-4: ras bal gyi me tog gis zhag bdun gyi bar
T02D2674:121b-5: du thun re re bzhin du chu'i nang du dor
T02D2674:121b-6: bar bya'o // des dgra la sogs pa rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:121b-7: de nas gzhan yang bshad ma thag pa'i me tog
T02D2674:121b-8: gsum po de'i kha smras kyi sa la mngon par
T02D2674:121b-9: chas pa'i thag mi ring tsam du gnas te sngags
T02D2674:121b-10: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing mnye bar bya'o //
T02D2674:121b-11: des ni kha smras las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:121b-12: de nas gzhan yang ba'i lci ba las kong bu
T02D2674:121b-13: gsum byas nas de la aa 'bras dang shimbi dang
T02D2674:121b-14: ras bal gyi lo ma chag pa rnyings pa ma
T02D2674:121b-15: yin pa rim pa ji lta bar bcug ste /
T02D2674:121b-16: lag pa g-yon pas phreng ba bzung nas sngags bzlas
T02D2674:121b-17: shing skud pa phreng ba la nye bar mchod pa
T02D2674:121b-18: byas nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02D2674:121b-19: kha lhor bltas nas mtshan mo thun dang po'i rjes
T02D2674:121b-20: la don dang sbyar ba'i sngags ji tsam nus pa
T02D2674:121b-21: zhag bdun du bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2674:121b-22: de nas gzhan yang sgyed po gsum gyi steng du
T02D2674:121b-23: khog ma sar par 'bras s'a lu'i ling+ga gsum byas
T02D2674:121b-24: nas dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas sngags spel tshig
T02D2674:121b-25: dang bcas pa zlos shing 'og tu me btang lo
T02D2674:121b-26: ma de dag thams cad bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2674:121b-27: gzhan yang rgyas pa'i thab khung ngam gyo mo sar
T02D2674:121b-28: par srin nyi chung shos la sngags bzlas shing byang
T02D2674:121b-29: bu mngon du phyogs pas sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas
T02D2674:121b-30: shing sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen por 'gyur ro
T02D2674:121b-31: // ae shod thi rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:121b-32: ae sha zhes do ste sho ta pu rna rna ba'o //
T02D2674:121b-33: audthi ta zhes pa dan pa la'o //
T02D2674:121b-34: dzva la zhes pa ni aarga dkar po'o //
T02D2674:121b-35: dzi ho zhes pa ni snu hi'o //
T02D2674:121b-36: 'di dag cha mnyam por bsres te 'dag par byas nas srang la gzhal ba'i ri lu bya ste /
T02D2674:121b-37: gzhon nu mas bkal pa'i skud pa pa'i phreng bas
T02D2674:121b-38: sv'ah'a'i gong du zhi ba la sogs pa gang 'dod
T02D2674:121b-39: sbyar ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2674:121b-40: sbun pa'i zhes pa bar shun spar ba gang dang
T02D2674:121b-41: au dumw'a ra'i shing sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad shing
T02D2674:121b-42: bu dang bcas pa'i yam shing dang /
T02D2674:122a-0: rengs pa'i thab ser po'i nang du @122a * //
T02D2674:122a-3: khyim zhes pa ni gang gi khyim srung bar byed
T02D2674:122a-4: par ming sngon du 'gro bas snyim pa bdun gtor
T02D2674:122a-5: te phyogs che ge mo srung bar bsam par bya'o
T02D2674:122a-6: // mes tshig pa'i me kha las thar bar byed
T02D2674:122a-7: do zhes pa ni tshig pa'i sa la lan nyi
T02D2674:122a-8: shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lag gam rtsa
T02D2674:122a-9: d'ur bas byab pa byas shing phu gsum byas nas
T02D2674:122a-11: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni gser
T02D2674:122a-12: dang dngul dang rdza gsar pa'i khog ma la sogs
T02D2674:122a-13: pa'i snod gtsang ma'i chus yongs su gang ba'i dbus
T02D2674:122a-14: su zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du thod pa'i
T02D2674:122a-15: snod du me tog dkar po la sogs pa la
T02D2674:122a-16: thun gsum du sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
T02D2674:122a-17: rma bya chen mo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas don
T02D2674:122a-18: ma grub kyi bar du padma'i phyag rgyas sbyin sreg
T02D2674:122a-19: bya'o // aom padme zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2674:122a-20: aom panytsa ni la sv'ah'a zhes pa'i mtha' can 'di
T02D2674:122a-21: nas sngags brgyad mi 'jigs pa'i sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor
T02D2674:122a-22: gyi bzlas pa dang las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2674:122a-23: sngags dang po la phu gsum gyi yi ge sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2674:122a-24: mig ces pa ni tshes grangs gang la mig nad
T02D2674:122a-25: langs pa la de kho na la rengs par bya
T02D2674:122a-26: ste / sngags 'di bzlas shing mthe bong dang srin
T02D2674:122a-27: lag gi thal ba khyer nas kha steng du blta
T02D2674:122a-28: ste mig kun du yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2674:122a-29: byab pa zhes pa lag pas byab pa'o //
T02D2674:122a-30: rtsig pa la zhes pa ni thod lo kor la
T02D2674:122a-31: lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsig pa la bris pa'i sngags
T02D2674:122a-32: de mig nad can gyis rtag tu blta bar bya'o
T02D2674:122a-33: // aom mo tsa ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:122a-34: mi 'jigs pa'i sgrol ma 'dis mngon par bsngags zhes pa ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02D2674:122a-35: bcings pa la mngon du phyogs pa zhes pa ni
T02D2674:122a-36: gang na brtson bu bcings pa yod pa'i phyogs de
T02D2674:122a-37: la blta zhing de la dmigs pas bzlas pa byas
T02D2674:122a-38: na grol par 'gyur bar blta ba dang /
T02D2674:122a-39: grong de la gnas nas chu gtor ba'o //
T02D2674:122a-40: rtag tu zhes pa ni gong bzhin du'o //
T02D2674:122a-41: aom ha ri zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:122a-42: sa'i steng du zhes pa ni dri zhim po la sogs pas byug pa bya'o //
T02D2674:122a-43: yang dang yang du zhes pa ni sngags kyi phreng
T02D2674:122a-44: ba gnyis rim pa dang rim pa las bzlog pa
T02D2674:122b-0: bris te rim pa dang rim pa ma @122b yin
T02D2674:122b-1: pa phyi ba'i thal ba gtor te bsrub par bya'o
T02D2674:122b-2: // yang na padma phyed pa bri zhes pa gong bzhin du 'brel lo //
T02D2674:122b-3: aom ta ra ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D2674:122b-4: che ge mo'i dzi bam zhes pa ni lha sbyin
T02D2674:122b-5: la sogs pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2674:122b-6: aom ta ra zhes pa yang gong bzhin no //
T02D2674:122b-7: aom randa zhes pa la sogs pa la ;
T02D2674:122b-8: pho nyar 'ong phas zhes pa ni pho nyar 'byung
T02D2674:122b-9: ba la chu khyor ba re re la lan bdun
T02D2674:122b-10: bdun bzlas nas 'thung du bcug pa'o zhes 'brel to
T02D2674:122b-11: // yang na bum pa'i chu la lan nyi shu
T02D2674:122b-12: rtsa gcig bzlas te pho nyar 'byung ba la ji
T02D2674:122b-13: tsam 'dod pa 'thung du gzhug ces pa ni man
T02D2674:122b-14: // ngag go // aom aa ma ra ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:122b-15: legs par bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum mo //
T02D2674:122b-16: mngon par bsngags zhes pa las sbyor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags na'o //
T02D2674:122b-17: sngags mdud ces pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal pa'i
T02D2674:122b-18: skud pa de thal mo'i bar du bcug nas stong
T02D2674:122b-19: pa nyid las byung ba dmigs te sngags brgya rtsa
T02D2674:122b-20: brgyad bzlas so // de nas mdud pa rang la
T02D2674:122b-21: sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i mdud pa byas nas nad
T02D2674:122b-22: pa'i ske la gdags par bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-23: rtag tu zhes pa gong bzhin no //
T02D2674:122b-24: mar dang til zhes pa ni nyi ma re re
T02D2674:122b-25: bzhin du nad zhi ba la byi la'i rkang rjes
T02D2674:122b-26: tshad tsam gyi til gyi brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2674:122b-27: de bzhin du ba dmar mo'i mar la yang sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-28: dgos pa chen po la sbyin sreg stong ngo //
T02D2674:122b-29: shin tu che ba la khri tsho'o //
T02D2674:122b-30: lan brgya sgrub pa zhes pa rgyun ma chad par
T02D2674:122b-31: sngags bzlas shing snod la mar gzhag la bskus te
T02D2674:122b-32: g-yas skor gyis chu de der bar bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-33: de ltar lan brgya'i bar du bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-34: gdug pa'i sman la zhes pa ni /
T02D2674:122b-35: 'bras mkhar ma can gyi 'dag pa cha lnga mnyam por byas nas ri lu bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-36: rjes la cha lnga po'i phyed me la gdung bar
T02D2674:122b-37: byas pa dang phyed de ltar bzhag nas yang gcig
T02D2674:122b-38: tu byas nas g-yas ngos kyi snod du gzhag go
T02D2674:122b-39: // g-yon du ni tshva dang ske tshe'o //
T02D2674:122b-40: de nas skrangs rlos dang thor pa la sogs pa byung ba'i nad pa byang du kha bstan la /
T02D2674:122b-41: slob dpon lhor kha bltas nas lag pa gnyis kyis 'dag pa des nad pa la byab par bya'o //
T02D2674:122b-42: de nas tshva dang ske tshes kyang byab par bya'o //
T02D2674:123a-1: g-yas skor dang g-yon skor bya'o //
T02D2674:123a-2: de nas de dag thams cad khron ba skam po'am lam rgya gram du gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2674:123a-3: de bo la sogs pa ni shing tog gi nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2674:123a-4: gza' nyi ma'i tshes grangs la nad pa byang du mgo bstan la gan rkyal du gzhag ste /
T02D2674:123a-5: de'i gsus pa'i skran gyi thog tu be do la sogs pa'i shing tog gzhag ste /
T02D2674:123a-6: nyi ma gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas pa'i mtshon gyis sngags bzlas shing /

T02D2674:126a-33: 'od zer gyis brtan pa dang g-yo ba bkug ste

T02D2674:126a-37: rjes su gnang ba zhu ba'i rnam par bsgoms te

T02D2674:126a-39: bya'o // aom stam bha ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni spyan ma'i snying po ste /
T02D2674:126a-40: rgyun ma chad par zlos pa la 'jigs pa thams

T02D2674:126b-1: dang po zhes pa ni nyon mongs kyi dgra gsod

T02D2674:126b-5: // / legs par sangs rgyas pa'i zhes pa ni ston pa gzhan ma yin pas so //

T02D2674:126b-7: rab la goms pas dbang po rnon po rab tu
T02D2674:126b-8: sad pa'o // yon tan gzhi yin pa zhes pa
T02D2674:126b-9: bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la nges pas dbang ba
T02D2674:126b-10: la sogs pa'i rim pas bde gshegs kyi sgrub thabs
T02D2674:126b-11: sad pa'o // rtogs pas so // bla ma la
T02D2674:126b-12: gus pas zhes pa ni lus ngag gi sri zhus

T02D2674:126b-19: no // du bstan nas / aom na mo zhes

T02D2674:126b-21: zhes pa'i mtha' can gyi sngags bzlas shing me long

T02D2674:126b-26: no // du bstan nas / zhes 'brel lo //

T02D2674:126b-28: can gser gyi mdog lta bu rgyal po chen po'i

T02D2674:126b-31: rjes la nyi ma re re zhing rgyun ma chad
T02D2674:126b-32: par stong phrag re re bzlas par bya zhes 'brel

T02D2674:126b-35: gzhan thams cad gong bzhin no //
T02D2674:126b-36: aom mu tsi li zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:126b-37: bsnyen gnas la sogs pa thams cad gong bzhin no //
T02D2674:126b-39: aom pra dzva la la sogs pa'i las so //
T02D2674:126b-40: aom na ma zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2674:126b-41: aom karna zhes pa la sogs pa la /

T02D2674:126b-43: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge
T02D2674:126b-44: 'dzin la gnas shing zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed
T02D2674:126b-45: kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par zhugs so
T02D2674:127a-0: // aom tsa tur p'u dza zhes pa la sogs pa ni @127a * //
T02D2674:127a-2: aom bhu dha zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127a-3: the tshom med pa ni bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa dang ldan pas so //
T02D2674:127a-4: lig bu mig ces pa ni tshong dpon las 'ong ba'i rdzas rdo'i bye brag go //
T02D2674:127a-5: ma ri sha sngo'i sa bon dang 'dra ba la'i lungs so //
T02D2674:127a-6: shing aa gasti zhes pa ni shukla bang gla sha
T02D2674:127a-7: na zhes pa rgya gar dang bal yul na yod
T02D2674:127a-8: / aom sva bh'a na zhes pa la sogs pa ni cho ga gong du bstan pas go sla'o //
T02D2674:127a-9: aom aadhida ces pa la sogs pa yi ge 'bum
T02D2674:127a-10: bzlas pa zhes pa ni yi ge re re la
T02D2674:127a-11: 'bum bzlas nas don brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2674:127a-12: pri yang ku'i me tog ces pa la sogs pa
T02D2674:127a-13: ni nyi ma re re zhing thun gsum nyi shu
T02D2674:127a-14: rtsa gcig gi zhag gi bar du brgya phrag brgyad
T02D2674:127a-15: sbyin sreg bya'o // pa l'a sha zhes pa la
T02D2674:127a-16: sogs pa ni sbyin sreg 'bum gyis zhes pa'i mtha'
T02D2674:127a-17: rgyun ma chad ces lhag ma'o //
T02D2674:127a-18: 'o ma can gyi yam shing zhes pa ni dug shing gi rigs spangs pa'i gzhan rnams so //
T02D2674:127a-19: bzlas pa byas pa rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D2674:127a-20: zhes pa ni bdun phrag gsum du'o //
T02D2674:127a-22: aom dza ye zhes pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug
T02D2674:127a-23: gi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par zhugs pas
T02D2674:127a-26: dpe med pa'i gzugs can bde ba'i gdan la gzhugs [*gzhug] pa'o //
T02D2674:127a-28: aom me khe zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127a-29: 'bum ni mi zad pa'i nor gyi phung po'o //
T02D2674:127a-30: aom ka ma la zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127a-31: dpal chen mo zhes pa ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D2674:127a-32: pa me tog pri yang ku lta bu'i sku mdog
T02D2674:127a-33: ljang gu // sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pa /
T02D2674:127a-34: chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can rgyal po chen po'i rol pas bzhugs pa /
T02D2674:127a-35: g-yon du autpala sngon po gzhag pa /
T02D2674:127a-36: bud med kyi sgyu ma'i nga rgyal gyis 'gying bag can gyi sgrol ma ste /
T02D2674:127a-37: dpal chen mo'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02D2674:127a-38: de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'am /
T02D2674:127a-39: kha cig na re nor rgyun ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2674:127a-41: aom nanti zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127a-42: 'di ru cho ga ni 'di kho na'o //
T02D2674:127a-43: aom dzam bhe zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127b-0: rje btsun ma @127b sgrol ma zhes pa ni byin rlabs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2674:127b-1: mngon par ma chad ces pa brtsams pa'i nyi ma
T02D2674:127b-2: nas bzung nas ji srid 'bum phrag bdun rdzogs par
T02D2674:127b-3: ma gyur pa de srid du rgyun ma chad par
T02D2674:127b-4: nyi ma re re thun gsum du ji ltar nus
T02D2674:127b-5: pa'i sngags bzlas shing me tog re re'i zhabs la
T02D2674:127b-6: dbul bar bya'o ; / aom ba su zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127b-7: ba'i lci ba zhes pa ni sa la ma reg pas so //
T02D2674:127b-9: aom ba su zhes pa la sogs pa la nges
T02D2674:127b-10: pa la gnas pa zhes pa ni bsnyen gnas kyi
T02D2674:127b-11: sdom pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2674:127b-13: dus gsum la mgo 'khru ba dang /
T02D2674:127b-14: rtsva ku sha'i gdan la bsnyal ba'i don to //
T02D2674:127b-15: nor rgyun ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
T02D2674:127b-16: de kho na bzhin byas nas rgyud las ji ltar gsungs pa ltar rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:127b-17: aom ba su zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2674:127b-19: lhag ma brgyad ni 'khor gyi lha mo brgyad kyi'o //
T02D2674:127b-20: bcom ldan 'das ma ni sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D2674:127b-21: gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu dang /
T02D2674:127b-22: phyag g-yas na shing thog pi dza b'ur dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya can /
T02D2674:127b-23: phyag g-yon pa na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa /
T02D2674:127b-24: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D2674:127b-25: rgyan kun gyis yang dag par brgyan pa /
T02D2674:127b-26: bud med kyi sgyu ma'i nga rgyal gyis 'gying ba /
T02D2674:127b-27: rin po che 'bar ba skyug par gyur pa'i padma'i gter la sogs pa zhabs kyis mnan pa /
T02D2674:127b-28: lha mo gzhan rnams ni gtso mo dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2674:127b-29: gser gyi 'dab ma zhes ba ni khrus byas gos
T02D2674:127b-30: gtsang ma gyon bsnyen gnas la gnas pa skar ma
T02D2674:127b-31: rgyal gyi nyi ma la gser gyi smyu gus mngon
T02D2674:127b-33: bcug ste zhes pa ni sgrub pa pos de'i nyin
T02D2674:127b-34: par kho na rab gnas byas te dbang bskur nas
T02D2674:127b-35: nyi ma de nas brtsams te dus gsum du de'i
T02D2674:127b-36: mdun du de'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i mchod pa byas
T02D2674:127b-37: nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags brgya phrag brgyang bzlas
T02D2674:127b-38: par bya zhes pa ni man ngag gi bshad pa'o
T02D2674:127b-39: // aom dzam bha la zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:127b-40: bcas pa zhes pa ni byin pa g-yon pa'i steng nas lha mos 'khyud pa'i don te /
T02D2674:128a-1: du bya ste zhes pa gsung gi tshig gi mtha'
T02D2674:128a-2: can gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga
T02D2674:128a-3: bzhin du mngar gsum gyis yongs su gang ba'i snod
T02D2674:128a-4: kyi dbus su bzhag nas de'i mdun du thun gsum
T02D2674:128a-5: du mchod pa dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bya
T02D2674:128a-6: ste / nyin re bzhin du thun re brgya rtsa
T02D2674:128a-7: brgyad bzlas pa'i khyor chu sbyin pa'i rjes la bcom
T02D2674:128a-8: ldan 'das la mngar gsum phul nas /
T02D2674:128a-9: aom dzam lum sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags 'dis kha
T02D2674:128a-10: bkab pa'i rdza phor gyi steng du chu khyor ba
T02D2674:128a-11: brgyad phul nas sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o
T02D2674:128a-12: // zla ba drug gi bar du'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
T02D2674:128a-13: bdud kyi bar chad 'byung bas brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2674:128a-14: nam du yang the tshom mi za bar bya'o //
T02D2674:128a-15: gnyis pa zhes pa ni 'jug pa'i sems rtogs pas so //
T02D2674:128a-16: le'u ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2674:128a-19: // / aom badzra t'ikshna zhes pa la sogs pa la ;
T02D2674:128a-20: / sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das mtshan yang dag par
T02D2674:128a-21: brjod pa'i skus las kyi tshogs bsgrub par bya ste
T02D2674:128a-22: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o //
T02D2674:128a-23: snying ga'i padma dang zla ba'i steng du zhes pa ni sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i steng du'o //
T02D2674:128a-24: sems dpa' can zhes pa ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2674:128a-25: lag pa gnyis kyis bdag gi mgo 'dzin ma zhes
T02D2674:128a-26: pa ni lag pa gnyis kyis spyi bor rdo rje
T02D2674:128a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs sngags rnams kyis zhes
T02D2674:128a-29: pa ni rim pa ji lta bar mdun du gnas
T02D2674:128a-30: pa padma dang zla ba'i steng du ye shes kyi
T02D2674:128a-32: bdag la rab tu zhugs shing dbang sdud la sogs pas tshim par byed pa dang /
T02D2674:128a-34: dgag par byas nas rim pa bzhin du yang dag par mchod /
T02D2674:128a-35: des de kho na bzhin du rab tu zhugs par bya'o zhes so //
T02D2674:128a-36: nang par bsam zhes pa'i tshig gi mtha' can la
T02D2674:128a-37: bam gyi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sna
T02D2674:128a-38: tshogs padma'i nang na gnas pa'i zla ba la padma'i
T02D2674:128a-39: skyil krung gis bzhugs pa zhes pa ni lhag ma'o
T02D2674:128a-40: // dharma dh'a tu zhes mthar rnam par bsgoms nas
T02D2674:128b-0: gong bzhin du bsnyen gnas @128b kyi sdom pa la
T02D2674:128b-2: shu dag ces pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2674:128b-3: 'das yang dag par mchod pa dang mandala byas la
T02D2674:128b-4: de'i mdun du rim gyis shu dag sran ma tsam
T02D2674:128b-5: nas zho phyed kyi bar du goms pas de nas
T02D2674:128b-6: tshad de nyid kyis 'thung ba brtsam par bya zhes
T02D2674:128b-9: aom b'a kye zhes pa la sogs pa la me tog spos ma reg pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D2674:128b-10: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas nas zhes pa ni
T02D2674:128b-11: shar du las thams cad pa'i thab khung zhes pa
T02D2674:128b-12: ni lhag ma'o // 'di dag ni sngon du bsnyen gnas sdom pa dang ldan pas bya'o //
T02D2674:128b-13: rang skyur zhes pa ni lo ma skyur po'i don to //
T02D2674:128b-14: bhra ma'i phye dang skyur po bsres pa 'di gnyis kyi nyams len ni shu dag gong bzhin no //
T02D2674:128b-15: lcags las byas pa zhes pa ni ma yu ral gri ba dang /
T02D2674:128b-16: su bar pandi ta zhes pa'i lcags gnyis gang yang
T02D2674:128b-17: rung ba las byas pa'i ral gri lag pa g-yon
T02D2674:128b-18: pas bzung nas ; phyi rol du sgrub pa po'i grogs gzhag ste /
T02D2674:128b-19: gzas zin pa ma mthong bar g-yas pas lte ba'i
T02D2674:128b-20: thad kar phreng ba bzung zhes grogs pos zla ba
T02D2674:128b-21: gza' las grol lo zhes mi zer gyi bar du
T02D2674:128b-22: bzlas pa bya'o // 'khor lo zhes pa ni gser
T02D2674:128b-23: dang dngul dang 'khar ba dang zangs de rnams yang
T02D2674:128b-24: gang yang rung ba cig la byas pa'o //
T02D2674:128b-25: rdo rje zhes pa ni me tog punta ka'i shing
T02D2674:128b-26: dang me tog n'a ga ge sar gyi shing gang
T02D2674:128b-27: yang rung ba cig gis so //
T02D2674:128b-28: rtse gsum pa zhes pa ni byang chub kyi shing las byas pa'o //
T02D2674:128b-29: 'jag ma shar zhes pa ni mda'i rgyu'o //
T02D2674:128b-30: tho ba zhes pa ni ma dhu ka'i shing ngam /
T02D2674:128b-31: rakta tsan dha na'i shing ngam /
T02D2674:128b-32: aa sho ka'i shing rnams gang yang rung ba las byas pa'o //
T02D2674:128b-33: zhags pa zhes pa ni gser dngul la sogs lcags brgyad kyi gang yang rung ba zhes pa'o //
T02D2674:128b-34: yang na rtsa mur ba'am 'jag ma bal pa dzas byas pa'o //
T02D2674:128b-36: ral gri khru gang ba dang /
T02D2674:128b-37: mtshon bhirna di p'a la dang /
T02D2674:129a-3: ta ri rnams ni la sogs pa'i don te /
T02D2674:129a-4: ji ltar 'byor pa khyer nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2674:129a-5: rim pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni badzra t'ikshna la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D2674:129a-6: bcud len la sogs pa ni bdud rtsi rnam pa bdun dang ka ra'i bza' ba'o //
T02D2674:129a-9: dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i dngul chu'i sman dang /
T02D2674:129a-10: ka ra dang rtsa ba med ces bya ba sman sbyor dang /
T02D2674:129a-11: ka ra dang ku shu'am na da gnyis las byung ba'i sman sbyor dang /
T02D2674:129a-12: bu ram dang shing thog kushma na pdi las byung ba'i sman sbyor dang /
T02D2674:129a-13: ka ra dang skyu ru ra las byung ba'i sman sbyor rnams so //
T02D2674:129a-14: mig sman ni ra s'anydza na zhes pa rdo'i bye brag go //
T02D2674:129a-16: padma dkar po'i skud pa'i sdong bu las byung ba'i snag tsha dang /
T02D2674:129a-17: sngo bhrang+ga ra dza'i khu bas sbyar ba'i dum bu dang aarka'i lo ma las byas pa'i snag tsha'o //
T02D2674:129a-18: thig le zhes pa ni gi wang ngam /
T02D2674:129a-22: rkang la bsku ba zhes pa ni sngo go bandha
T02D2674:129a-23: na dang shing shal ma li'i khu ba dang bcas
T02D2674:129a-24: pas so // rkang la bsku ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'i brda'o //
T02D2674:129a-25: yang na lha ma ni shing las byas pa'o //
T02D2674:129a-26: dbang du gyur pa'i rdzas ni me tog pri yang ku dang /
T02D2674:129a-27: spos kyi shing sa li ha ka dang /
T02D2674:129a-29: me tog n'a ga ge sar cha phyed kyis byugs pa'o //
T02D2674:129a-30: sman spos ni la pa na kha di dang /
T02D2674:129a-35: 'di gnyis cha mnyam pa'i spos so //
T02D2674:129a-36: gzhan du bstan pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i rdzas rnams
T02D2674:129a-37: lhan cig tu bsdus nas kyang cho ga 'dis bsgrub
T02D2674:129a-38: par bya'o // 'o ma zhes pa ni de bzhin
T02D2674:129a-39: du zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su mar khu
T02D2674:129a-40: dang ka ra btab pa'i 'o ma 'bras thug dang
T02D2674:129a-41: de bzhin du zho dang 'dres pa'i zan dang bza'
T02D2674:129a-43: bal sran ma sha zhes pa ni me dang mar
T02D2674:129a-44: nag dang mar khu dang chus ma reg pa dang
T02D2674:129a-45: / ma rul ba dang srin la sogs pas ma khyer ba dang /
T02D2674:129a-47: bdud rtsi lngas yang dag par byug pa byas pa dang /
T02D2674:129b-0: @129b spos dkar pos dril ba'i bal sran rnams zla
T02D2674:129b-1: ba gzas zin pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das yang
T02D2674:129b-2: dag par mchod nas de'i mdun du shar phyogs su
T02D2674:129b-3: kha bltas nas de dag khar bcug ste /
T02D2674:129b-4: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas zla ba ma mthong
T02D2674:129b-5: bar zla ba gza' las ma grol bar du ma
T02D2674:129b-7: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos zla ba grol ba
T02D2674:129b-8: bshad pa dang kha nas phyung nas ban sran myu
T02D2674:129b-9: gu can rnams chu khyor ba gang gi nang du
T02D2674:129b-10: bzhag nas sos ma reg par mid par bya zhes
T02D2674:129b-11: 'brel lo // myu gu med pa de dag la
T02D2674:129b-12: ma reg par byas nas mi ma yin pas zin
T02D2674:129b-13: pa rnams kyi mgor sngags bzlas shing phye ma byas
T02D2674:129b-14: nas btab na de las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2674:129b-15: padma zhes pa ni ji ltar rnyed pa'i dkar po la sogs pa'i padma rnams so //
T02D2674:129b-16: bil pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni srin la sogs pas ma khyer ba dang /
T02D2674:129b-17: dgos pa can smin pa dang /
T02D2674:129b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa zhes pa la
T02D2674:129b-20: sogs pa ni dri zhim pa'i me tog dkar po
T02D2674:129b-21: rnams kyis so // padma la sogs pa me tog
T02D2674:129b-22: gi mtha' can gyi las sbyor gsum po 'di dag
T02D2674:129b-23: 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i rgyas pa'i thab
T02D2674:129b-24: khung khru bcu drug la rab tu sbyor ro //
T02D2674:129b-25: mar la btags pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D2674:129b-26: bal sran bzhin du 'bru lngas dbang gi thab khung
T02D2674:129b-28: rtag tu zhes pa la sogs pas rgyun ma chad

T02D2674:129b-31: bshad pas badzra t'ikshna zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2674:129b-32: kyi don skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin bsgoms pa

T02D2674:129b-39: rtogs pas rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su rim pas
T02D2674:129b-40: chos kyi sprin gyis thob pa'i rjes la kun du
T02D2674:129b-41: 'od kyis skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2674:130a-1: su bzung ba la yang dag par zhugs pas zhes 'brel lo //
T02D2674:130a-2: aom dhr'i:zhes pa la sogs pa ni dpa' bo gcig
T02D2674:130a-3: tu sgrub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'di sngar
T02D2674:130a-4: gyi sngags gnyis dang bya ba mtshungs pas gong gi
T02D2674:130a-5: bzhin du 'bras bu yang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2674:130a-6: so// aom hr'i:zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2674:130a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di'i bsgom pa brjod pa'i rjes su zhes brjod do //
T02D2674:130a-8: aom pra kri ti zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D2674:130a-9: rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa ste sgrib pa
T02D2674:130a-11: sarba dharm'a zhes chos thams cad ces pa phyi rol gyi chos rnams so //

T02D2674:130a-16: sva bh'a ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste yongs
T02D2674:130a-17: su rdzogs pa'i tha snyad btags nas rgyu dang mi
T02D2674:130a-18: rgyu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2674:130a-19: 'od gsal mngon par brjod nas rdzus skyes kyi sems
T02D2674:130a-20: can gyi tshul gyis rdzogs rim gyis bcom ldan 'das

T02D2674:130a-22: // gong du smos pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan
T02D2674:130a-23: 'das ma bzhin du lha mo bzhi yang bsam par

T02D2674:130a-25: gzhan yang bsgom pa brjod pa ni nges par bdag
T02D2674:130a-26: nyid ces pa ni gong gi dmigs pa la sems
T02D2674:130a-27: rtse gcig pa'o // aom mdzad de kho na'i yi ge ni padma r'a ga lta bu'o //
T02D2674:130a-28: sngags dang 'dres pa'i sman gyi nus pa brjod pa ni /

T02D2674:130a-32: aa ru ra la sogs pa'i phye ma srang gcig khyer nas /
T02D2674:130a-33: mar bre gang zhes pa ni ba mar phul bzhi
T02D2674:130a-34: blugs nas sman btab nas chu 'o ma la ma
T02D2674:130a-35: thim gyi bar du bskol bar bya'o //
T02D2674:130a-36: sngags 'di'i sbyor ba gzhan ni shu dag ces pa

T02D2674:130a-38: por byas nas thun gcig tshad dam phyed kyi tshad
T02D2674:130a-39: kyis so // aom bha ga ba ti ni la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D2674:130a-40: aom aa rka zhes pa la sogs pa la bsnyen
T02D2674:130a-41: snyen gnas las zhes pa ni gong bzhin du sgom
T02D2674:130a-42: pa pos bzlas par bya zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2674:130b-0: @130b can gyi mar ram zhes pa ni sngar gong du bshad pa'i dbyangs can gyi mar ram /

T02D2674:130b-2: mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni ba mar phul bzhi dang /

T02D2674:130b-4: phul bcu drug / au ba la sogs pa srang

T02D2674:130b-7: pi pi ling la sogs pa sman lnga srang gi bzhi cha bzhi cha'o //
T02D2674:130b-8: yang dag par bsdus nas mar dang bsres nas sman dpa'i man ngag gis zhes 'brel lo //
T02D2674:130b-9: aom aa nanta zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2674:130b-10: aom aa ra zhes pa la sogs pa la /

T02D2674:130b-12: de las gzhan pa ni ri bong 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o //
T02D2674:130b-13: rgyud 'di las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
T02D2674:130b-14: dang de ma yin pa 'jam dpal gyi sku'i padma'i
T02D2674:130b-15: 'og tu bsgrub bya gan rkyal du bya ste /
T02D2674:130b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi autpala las bcings par
T02D2674:130b-17: bsams nas de'i khar thun gsum du me tog dkar
T02D2674:130b-18: po brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2674:130b-19: aom b'a g'i zhes pa la sogs pa la 'khor
T02D2674:130b-20: lo'i dbus su zhes pa ni 'khor lo la gnas
T02D2674:130b-21: pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge
T02D2674:130b-22: mum dmar po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2674:130b-23: aom dharm'a zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2674:130b-24: aom badzra t'ikshna zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D2674:130b-25: 'jug pa'i sems bskyed kyis 'bring gi chen po rtogs nas gsum pa'o //
T02D2674:130b-26: phat la snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2674:130b-29: // / aom la ba na zhes ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:130b-30: sgeg pa'i cha lugs zhes pa ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can la rol pas blta ba'o //
T02D2674:130b-31: bzhugs pa zhes pa ni padma'i skyi krung gis so //
T02D2674:130b-32: tsha ba'i sbyin sreg ces pa ni dbang du sdud
T02D2674:130b-33: pa'i cho ga las bshad pa'i sor bcu gnyis pa'i
T02D2674:130b-34: thab khung seng ldeng ngam khong khri'i me mdag du
T02D2674:130b-35: ba med pa la rin la mi rtseg par nyos
T02D2674:130b-36: pa'i thun gcig gi tshad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2674:130b-37: de nas g-yas pa dang g-yon pa gnyis su dgang
T02D2674:130b-38: gzar dang blugs gzar bzung tshvas bkang nas gzar bu
T02D2674:130b-39: gnyis kha sbyar te de lta bu'i dgang blugs gsum
T02D2674:131a-0: dbul bar bya'o // tshva dang bcas pa @131a * //
T02D2674:131a-1: zhes pa ni rin la mi rtseg par nyos pa'i
T02D2674:131a-2: tshva dang bcas pa'i spra tshil gyis bsgrub bya pho'am
T02D2674:131a-3: mo'i sor bzhi'i tshad byas la /
T02D2674:131a-4: seng ldeng gi me mdag ces pa ni seng ldeng
T02D2674:131a-5: gi me mdag gam khong khri'i me mdag pa ba
T02D2674:131a-6: sangs kyi nyin par blangs pa'i dur khrod kyi sol
T02D2674:131a-7: ba dang bcas pas gang ba'i snod la zangs kyi
T02D2674:131a-8: thur mas bud med kyi mtshan ma phug pa'i rkang
T02D2674:131a-9: mthil phug nas ; thur ma ma zhig par bya ste me la bdug par bya'o //
T02D2674:131a-10: gal te zhig par 'gyur na de gnyis thal bas
T02D2674:131a-11: gang ba'i snod kyi steng du gzhag ste dus bag
T02D2674:131a-12: tsam song nas yang gcig tu bya'o //

T02D2674:131a-14: pho dang mo gang yang rung ba'i ling+ga bsku byug
T02D2674:131a-15: byas pa'i 'dag pa'i snod du byas nas gong bzhin
T02D2674:131a-18: aom la ba na zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2674:131a-19: tshva dang ske tshe mnyam por byas pa zhes pa
T02D2674:131a-20: ni 'gron bu rdog po nyi shu rtsa gcig gam
T02D2674:131a-22: khal nyi shu rtsa gcig gi rin ma rtseg par

T02D2674:131a-24: kyi thab kyi steng du ling+ga dang bcas pa snying
T02D2674:131a-25: gar bcug nas thun gsum du ma dang bde'am /
T02D2674:131a-28: phyi nas zhag bdun bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2674:131a-29: de rjes khugs na rin la mi rtseg par nyo
T02D2674:131a-30: ba'i tshva dang mnyam par byas nas gyo mog che
T02D2674:131a-31: shos kyi thab khung du sbyin sreg bya'o zhes 'brel
T02D2674:131a-32: lo // aom ku ru ku lle zhes pa la sogs pa la //
T02D2674:131a-33: sngar smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa zhes
T02D2674:131a-34: pa ni ku ru ku lle'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2674:131a-35: gnas pas so // yungs kar dkar po zhes pa ni 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2674:131a-36: sangs rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i bzlas pa'i tshig
T02D2674:131a-37: 'bum phrag bdun gsungs kyang bsnyen pa bye ba byas
T02D2674:131a-38: na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis las sbyor gyi
T02D2674:131a-39: sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub po //

T02D2674:131a-41: du sgrub pa byas pa'i ske tshe dang tshva cha
T02D2674:131a-42: mnyam por byas nas gong bzhin du sol bas gang
T02D2674:131a-43: ba'i snod du grong khyer dkrug pa'i phyir nub tu
T02D2674:131a-44: kha bltas rdo rje skyil krung bcas te dbang du
T02D2674:131a-45: bsdu ba'i phyir thun gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2674:131b-0: ji ltar bla @131b ma'i rim pa dang rim pa
T02D2674:131b-1: las lhag ma 'di'i las sbyor yod pa rnams ji
T02D2674:131b-2: bzhin du gzungs sngags kyi rgyal po 'di la yang
T02D2674:131b-3: yod do // ta nyi ku rull'a /
T02D2674:131b-5: aagni ni ku ta dza ni /
T02D2674:131b-10: aa pa ra dho hi ni bha dza b'i /
T02D2674:131b-11: hi ra ni nam ka ra si ;
T02D2674:131b-12: tinni rtsu lu rakta pi yam /
T02D2674:131b-13: aa mu ka ka ra ma ba sham /
T02D2674:131b-14: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di la gang gi ming btags
T02D2674:131b-15: nas chu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'thungs na
T02D2674:131b-16: de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D2674:131b-17: // aom aa ma le zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2674:131b-18: ni rtsig pa 'dod yon gyi snam bu zur bzhi
T02D2674:131b-19: byas nas de'i nang du g-yas skor gyis rtsva ku

T02D2674:131b-22: gzhan don la chags pas bklags pa tsam gyis sngags
T02D2674:131b-23: 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes mi mos pas spro

T02D2674:131b-26: gsungs pa'i las sbyor dang bzlas pa la sogs pa

T02D2674:131b-28: pa la re ba nges par 'grub ces pa'i don
T02D2674:131b-29: bar mi bya'o // to // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nam yang 'gyur ba med do //
T02D2674:131b-30: mang du smos pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02D2674:131b-31: bde bar gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i bden pa smra
T02D2674:131b-32: ba dang khams gsum la yang dag par spyod pa
T02D2674:131b-33: mi srid do // bzhi pa zhes pa ni rab kyi chen po rtogs nas so //
T02D2674:131b-34: rdzogs pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun
T02D2674:131b-35: du bdag gis ma lus par thob pa'i don to
T02D2674:131b-39: // / bsod nams 'di yis zag med phung po thob gyur nas //
T02D2674:131b-40: 'gro rnams srid gsum las rgyal sangs rgyas myur thob cing //
T02D2674:131b-41: gzhan yang dge ba'i tshogs kyi nyes pa kun spangs te //

T02D2674:131b-47: / // / pandi ta d'a na sh'i las rang 'gyur du
